channel.title: Documentation on Slibbe's new Hugo site
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on Slibbe's new Hugo site

item.title: Example Configs
item.description: To help you set up your site with BluestNight, you can download a template config.toml. If you use a server with Nginx, you can also download a template configuration file to place in /etc/nginx/conf.d/. If you have any experience writing configuration files for Apache servers or .htaccess files, please contribute to this issue on GitLab.
